data:query.name: get_table1
data:query.data:static-query: select product.productVendor productVendor, count(product.quantityInStock) count_quantityInStock, sum(product.quantityInStock) sum_quantityInStock, avg(product.quantityInStock) average_quantityInStock, max(product.quantityInStock) max_quantityInStock, min(product.quantityInStock) min_quantityInStock from product group by product.productVendor order by product.productVendor asc
